tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(100),
	diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
	treatment_plan TEXT,
	doctor_id INT,
	nurse_id INT,
	date_admitted DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  patient_diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  patient_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_date TIMESTAMP,
  treatment_doctor VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    birth_date DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE CareTeam (
    care_team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    care_team_name VARCHAR(100),
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    team_lead UUID,
    team_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE CarePlan (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    patient_id UUID,
    care_team_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE care_team_members (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    department_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    head_of_department VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    dob DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    primary_diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    assigned_care_team_member_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    recorded_by INT,
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Medical_Record (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    date_recorded DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE Medical_Team (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    team_lead INT,
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_lead) REFERENCES Medical_Professionals(professional_id) ON DELETE SET NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Care_Plan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    plan_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
